org.grules.functions.lib
[Groovy] Class StringFunctions

java.lang.Object
  org.grules.functions.lib.StringFunctions

@Functions
class StringFunctions

Converters and validators for strings.

Method Summary
java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String value)

Capitalizes the first letter.
boolean contains(java.lang.String value, java.lang.CharSequence substring)

Checks that a value contains the specified sequence of char values.
boolean endsWith(java.lang.String value, java.lang.String suffix)

Checks that a value ends with the specified suffix.
java.lang.String format(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Object... args)

@see String#format(String, Object...)
boolean isAlpha(java.lang.String value)

Checks that a string matches /[a-zA-Z]+/.
boolean isAlphaSpace(java.lang.String value)

Checks that a string matches /[a-zA-Z\s]+/.
boolean isAlphanum(java.lang.String value)

Checks that a string matches /[a-zA-Z0-9]+/.
boolean isAlphanumSpace(java.lang.String value)

Checks that a string matches /[a-zA-Z0-9\s]+/.
boolean isLengthBetween(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer minLength, java.lang.Integer maxLength)

Checks that a value string length is within the specified range (the range is inclusive).
boolean isLengthEq(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer length)

Checks that a value has the specified string length.
boolean isLengthLess(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer maxLength)

Checks that a value has a string length less than the specified length.
boolean isLengthLessEq(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer maxLength)

Checks that a value has a string length less or equal to specified length.
boolean isLengthMore(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer minLength)

Checks that a value has a string length more than the specified length.
boolean isLengthMoreEq(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer minLength)

Checks that a value has a string length more or equal to specified length.
boolean matches(java.lang.String value, java.lang.String regex)

Checks that a value is a string that matches the specified regex.
java.lang.String replaceAll(java.lang.String value, java.lang.String regexp, java.lang.String replacement)

Replaces each substring of a string value that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement.
boolean startsWith(java.lang.String value, java.lang.String prefix)

Checks if a value starts with the specified prefix.
java.lang.String substring(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer beginIndex, java.lang.Integer endIndex = -1)

Returns a new string that is a substring of this string.
java.lang.String toLowerCase(java.lang.String value)

Converts all of the characters in a value to lower case using the rules of the default locale.
java.lang.String toUpperCase(java.lang.String value)

Converts all of the characters in a value to upper case using the rules of the default locale.
java.lang.String trim(java.lang.String value)

Returns a copy of a value, with leading and trailing whitespace omitted.
java.lang.Object trim(java.lang.Object value)

An additional trim method to make it usable as a default converter.
